Text.val: --di update kembali ke vStat karena jika tidak di maintain di OFPR untuk period canceled

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Cannot cancel document in this period')
MlsTrans('Cannot cancel this document. One or more document depend on this document')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select docdate,docnum from ALLDOC_VIEW where objtype=:1 and docentry=:2

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans( 'Canceled =============== '& 'ODPI DocEntry n DocType : '& Str({2,3}, 'N15')&' || '&Trim({2,13})&' '& 'ORDR DocEntry n DocType : '& Str({0,4}, 'N15')&' || '&Str({0,3}, '10')&' '& 'DpmAmnt [ORDR] : '&Str({0,8}, 'N13.2')&' '& 'DpmAmnt [ODPI] : '&Str({0,6}, 'N13.2') )
NOT ISNULL({0,9}) AND {0,9} > 0 AND NOT ISNULL({0,10}) AND {0,10} = 1251
NOT ISNULL({0,9}) AND {0,9} > 0 AND NOT ISNULL({0,10}) AND {0,10} = 540000006

Header.Description: Check All PQ of PR Line

ExpSyntax.val: NOT ISNULL({0,9}) AND {0,9} > 0 AND NOT ISNULL({0,10}) AND {0,10} = 1251

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(1) as Total from TX_DOCREF R (nolock) join ALLDOC_VIEW T (nolock) on R.DocEntry = T.DocEntry and R.DocType = T.ObjType where R.flag_Select = 1 and R.flag_gen = 1 and T.Canceled = 'N' and R.BaseType = :1 and R.BaseEntry = :2

select x.ItemCode,x.DistNumber,x.Qty,OnHandQty from ( select h.ItemCode,h.WhsCode,h.BinAbs,h.DistNumber,sum(Qty) Qty from ItemHistory h (nolock) where h.Objtype=:1 and h.Docentry=:2 group by h.ItemCode,h.WhsCode,h.BinAbs,h.DistNumber )X left join OBBQ b (nolock) on b.ItemCode=x.ItemCode and b.DistNumber=x.DistNumber and x.BinAbs = b.BinAbs and x.WhsCode = b.WhsCode where OnHandQty<x.Qty

select x.ItemCode,x.Qty,OnHand from ( select h.ItemCode,WhsCode,sum(Qty) Qty from ItemHistory h (nolock) where h.Objtype=:1 and h.Docentry=:2 group by h.ItemCode,WhsCode )X left join OITW b (nolock) on b.ItemCode=x.ItemCode and b.WhsCode = x.WhsCode where OnHand<x.Qty
